Title: Amends the New York state college choice tuition savings program to have the program also apply to elementary and secondary schools
Summary: Amends the New York state college choice tuition savings program to have the program also apply to elementary and secondary schools.
LawCode: Amd Art 14-A Art Head, §§695, 695-a, 695-b & 695-d, Ed L; amd §§612 & 658, Tax L; amd §78, St Fin L; amd §5205, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, the tax law, the state finance law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to requiring the New York state college choice tuition savings program to also apply to elementary and secondary schools
